dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 5076 IH: Protection of College Sports Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Steube (for himself and Mrs. Bice) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To codify Executive Order 14322 (relating to college sports revenue and athlete compensation).

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Protection of College Sports Act.
Executive Order 14322 (90 Fed. Reg. 35821; relating to college sports revenue and athlete compensation) shall have the force and effect of law.
